page.title: 06Women's Clubs in Trefriw
page.content: The Women's Institute holds monthly meetings throughout the year with speakers both educational and entertaining. There are craft and cookery demonstrations, and an annual fund- rasing effort each July. Proceeds from this are shared between a chosen charity and Institute funds. Proceedings are bilingual, but a wholly Welsh meeting is held each March. Average membership is thirty. Merched y Wawr is an organisation similar to the Women's Institute but proceedings are wholly in Welsh. Membership averages thirty five.
